tool_description: The UniOdds API provides developers and businesses with direct access to dynamic and competitive betting odds from Unibet, one of the industry's leading online sports betting platforms. This robust API enables you to integrate real-time betting odds into your applications, enhancing user engagement and providing your customers with extensive betting options across a wide range of sports and events. Whether you're developing a sports analysis tool, a betting app, or looking to enrich your plat...
name: Uniodds
title: Uniodds

api_list.name: StartingSoon

optional_parameters.name: useCombined
optional_parameters.description: Whether to use combined or not.

optional_parameters.name: sport
optional_parameters.description: The name of the sport. If you want to include more than one, separate with comma.

optional_parameters.name: includeParticipants
optional_parameters.description: Whether to include participants or not.

api_list.name: Event
api_list.description: Get odds for a specific event, with the option to include participants.

optional_parameters.name: includeParticipants
optional_parameters.description: Whether to include participants or not.

api_list.name: Groups
api_list.description: Get available groups with an option to include live events groups.

optional_parameters.name: includeLive
optional_parameters.description: Whether to include live events groups or not.

api_list.name: Landing
api_list.description: Get landing odds with the option to include participants.

optional_parameters.name: includeParticipants
optional_parameters.description: Whether to include participants or not.

api_list.name: Group
api_list.description: Get group odds for specified group.

optional_parameters.name: group
optional_parameters.description: The id of the group. If you want to include more than one, separate with comma.

api_list.name: StartingWithin
api_list.description: Get odds for events starting within the specified time period. The maximum range between "from" and "to" is 48 hours.

optional_parameters.name: sport
optional_parameters.description: The name of the sport. If you want to include more than one, separate with a comma.

optional_parameters.name: useCombined
optional_parameters.description: Whether to use combined or not.

optional_parameters.name: to
optional_parameters.description: The final date. The format is: YYYYMMDDTHHmmSS%2Bhhzz, whereYYYY- year, MM- month, DD- day, HH- hour, mm- minute, SS- seconds, hh- hour offset, zz- minute offset. The offset is for different timezones.

optional_parameters.name: from
optional_parameters.description: The initial date. The format is: YYYYMMDDTHHmmSS%2Bhhzz, whereYYYY- year, MM- month, DD- day, HH- hour, mm- minute, SS- seconds, hh- hour offset, zz- minute offset. The offset is for different timezones.

api_list.name: In-Play
api_list.description: Get in-play odds for a specific sport.

optional_parameters.name: includeParticipants
optional_parameters.description: Whether to include participants or not.

optional_parameters.name: sport
optional_parameters.description: The name of the sport. If you want to include more than one, separate with comma.

optional_parameters.name: useCombined
optional_parameters.description: Whether to use combined or not.

api_list.name: LiveEvents
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://uniodds4.p.rapidapi.com/api/uniodds/live"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "uniodds4.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
